description: This file implements the main front-end component for a Tic Tac Toe game, providing UI, game logic, animations, and user interaction handling. It defines the root App component, manages game state, renders the game grid, and handles user actions like resets and new game initiations.

methods.name: emptyBoard
methods.description: Creates and returns a new empty game board with 9 null cells.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Determines if there is a winner based on current board state; returns the winner and winning line if found.

methods.name: handleCellPress
methods.description: Handles user tapping a cell, updates game state, triggers animations, and checks for game end conditions.

methods.name: onReset
methods.description: Resets the game board to initial state, keeping scores, and resets cell animations.

methods.name: onNewGame
methods.description: Resets the entire game including scores and state for a fresh start.

methods.name: renderSymbol
methods.description: Renders animated game symbols ('X' or 'O') within cells, applying rotation and scale animations.
